item.description:
Short version: 78 S. School St., Portsmouth, Wednesday noon ? ???

Sorry to have my first post be needy ? but I only just found this group.
(Thanks, Morey!) I do look forward to being involved once this task is
done.

I have a couple of ABF U-Pack ReloCubes showing up late Tuesday and need
at least one other person to help with a couple of heavy items on
Wednesday. I want to get this done as quickly as possible because I am
pretty sure I will be taking up at least one public parking spot to do
it.

Good news: Only one item is really heavy, and another awkward. A friend
and I did almost all the packing by ourselves on the other end.

Bad news: The new place is a three-story duplex, and the awkward thing
(a secretary (no, it's a kind of desk)) needs to go to the third floor.
The heavy item (a love seat) needs to go to the second ? if it fits.

Good news: pizza and beer afterward.

Bad news: It's a weekday.

Good news: Another porc has made the move!

If you can help, please reply privately with contact information.
Although ABF claims that my cubes will arrive in Salisbury at 2 am
tonight, there is always a chance that something may postpone their
delivery. If you aren't sure if you can help, reply privately and I
will send you my cell phone number so you can call in advance to check.

Thanks very much, in advance,
Chris
item.name: New seacoast mover needing help unloading few heavy items
